name: Cybersecurity
description: Learn about network security, ethical hacking, and protecting the digital landscape.

captain.name: Security Captain
captain.message: Join us in securing the future. Reach out for any security-related opportunities.

longDescription: In an increasingly digital world, security is paramount. Our sub-community explores various aspects of cybersecurity including web security, cryptography, and network defense. We conduct regular CTF (Capture The Flag) competitions to sharpen skills.
vision: Building a security-first mindset among students and contributing to a safer digital Nepal.
